column1: Old Toby was one of the three most notable varieties of pipe-weed
column2: grown in the region around Longbottom in the Shires Southfarthing.

column1: The leaf took its name from the Hobbit who introduced pipe-weed to the Shire
column4: who grew the first true pipe-weed in his gardens in the days of Isengrim Took II about the year  of Shire-reckoning.

column1: How Old Toby came by the plant is not recorded
column2: for to his dying day he would not tell.

column1: The genuine Westron name was zara-Tobi.
